This page covers biological details of component Accumbens Nucleus.
Region is part of aHuman target integrated biological model.

  * *Top-down path to region*: Forebrain Telencephalon -> Extended Amygdala (BFA.FT.EXTAM) -> Accumbens Nucleus (BGA.FT.ACC) (see [OverallMindMaps Mind Maps])
  * *Brain area*: [BrainAreaBGA Basal Ganglia Area]
  * *Role*: relay
  * *Function*: Activate motor functions under attention
  * *Notes to function*: inhibitory nucleus
